B

BitmapFontSupport - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.bridge
A utility class for loading BitmapFont instances from Structured JSON files (which use .json, .dat, .ubj, .json.lzma, or .ubj.lzma as their file extension).
BitmapFontSupport.JsonFontData - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.bridge
Mainly for internal use; allows loading BitmapFontData from a Structured JSON Font instead of a .fnt file.

C

com.github.tommyettinger.bridge - package com.github.tommyettinger.bridge
 
compress(FileHandle, FileHandle) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.LzmaUtils
Given an input FileHandle and an output FileHandle that will be overwritten, compresses input using Lzma and writes the result into output.

D

decompress(FileHandle, FileHandle) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.LzmaUtils
Given an input FileHandle compressed with Lzma, and an output FileHandle that will be overwritten, decompresses input into output.

G

getJsonLoader(FileHandle) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.JsonSkin
Overrides the default JSON loader to process Structured JSON Fonts from a Skin JSON.

JsonSkin - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.bridge
A subclass of Skin that includes a serializer for Structured JSON Fonts, which are typically generated by fontwriter.
JsonSkin() - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.JsonSkin
Creates an empty skin.
JsonSkin(FileHandle) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.JsonSkin
Creates a skin containing the resources in the specified skin JSON file.
JsonSkin(FileHandle, TextureAtlas) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.JsonSkin
Creates a skin containing the resources in the specified skin JSON file and the texture regions from the specified atlas.
JsonSkin(TextureAtlas) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.JsonSkin
Creates a skin containing the texture regions from the specified atlas.
JsonSkinLoader - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.bridge
An AssetLoader to load a JsonSkin.
JsonSkinLoader(FileHandleResolver) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.JsonSkinLoader
Creates a loader with the associated resolver.

loadStructuredJson(FileHandle, TextureRegion) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.bridge.BitmapFontSupport
Creates a BitmapFont by loading it from a Structured JSON Font, which is typically a .json, .dat, .ubj, .json.lzma, or .ubj.lzma file produced by FontWriter or a related tool.

Creates a BitmapFont by loading it from a Structured JSON Font, which is typically a .json, .dat, .ubj, .json.lzma, or .ubj.lzma file produced by FontWriter or a related tool.

Creates a BitmapFont by loading it from a Structured JSON Font, which is typically a .json, .dat, .ubj, .json.lzma, or .ubj.lzma file produced by FontWriter or a related tool.

Creates a BitmapFont by loading it from a Structured JSON Font, which is typically a .json, .dat, .ubj, .json.lzma, or .ubj.lzma file produced by FontWriter or a related tool.
